Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= action by which humans or animals cause food to pass down from their mouth to their esophagus; ≈ often used figuratively to denote destruction and death

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment

Node.gloss: to cry out|to cry for help
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
literally: heart; hence: = the location right in the middle of something else, such as the sea, the heavens, or a tree
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= flowing body of water
literally: to go around; hence: = state in which objects are located all around a person or animal
= a ridge of water curling into an arched form between two depressions in open water
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which people are expelled from their dwelling place

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)|= particle marking a proposition as contrastive, and so limiting the scope or impact of what was stated before
= process by which an action is repeated or continued

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= state in which someone is surrounded on all sides
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= the part of the body connecting the head and the rump and containing the passage ways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

= great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs
literally: to go around; hence: = state in which objects are located all around a person or animal

meaning unsure; probably: = a reed like plant, which grows in water and reaches a height of up to 3 m high; its fuzzy brown seed head becomes fluffy and blows away in the wind; ◄ Typha genus; ► used for baskets and mats; its roots are edible
= state in which something has been wrapped around part of someone's body

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
exact meaning unsure; probably: = lowest extremity of an object in nature
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
a long rigid piece of wood, metal, or similar material, attached in horizontal position to a gate so that it cannot be opened from the outside
= path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which humans are totally without physical strength and on the brink of death; ◄ caused by hunger and thirst and/or other physical suffering

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= action by which humans put their trust in something or someone else
= a deity who is unable to accomplish anything, ◄ compared to a light breeze
= state in which objects or activities do not serve a valid purpose and can only lead to disappointment

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
literally: confession; hence: = action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food
= action by which humans or animals vomit up something specific from their stomachs

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Amittai (אֲמִתַּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) who was sent to preach against Nineveh (נִינְוֵה)
= earth not covered by water
